abstractModulePack
Class AbstractInstrumentModule

java.lang.Object
  abstractModulePack.AbstractDeviceModule
      abstractModulePack.AbstractInstrumentModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeviceInterface, MeasurementInstrumentInterface, ModuleListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
RealInstrumentModule, SimulatedInstrumentModule
public abstract class AbstractInstrumentModule
extends AbstractDeviceModule
implements MeasurementInstrumentInterface, ModuleListener

This class implements some basic functionalities of a measurement instrument module. Users can choose to extend this class to get more functionalities.

Author:
tianzhao

public void startReadingPortData(int portIndex,
                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double> portData)
Description copied from interface: ModuleListener
This is a call-back function. A signal module will invoke startReadingPortData to start transferring portData to a specific port of this module listener

Specified by:
startReadingPortData in interface ModuleListener

endReadingPortData

public void endReadingPortData(int portIndex)
Description copied from interface: ModuleListener
This is a call-back function. A signal module will invoke endReadingPortData to close data transmission at an existing port of this module listener

Specified by:
endReadingPortData in interface ModuleListener

closePort

public void closePort(int portIndex)
Description copied from interface: ModuleListener
This is a call-back function. A signal module will call closePort to close the specific port of all the listener modules that are registered with this signal modules

Specified by:
closePort in interface ModuleListener

openPort

public void openPort(int portIndex)
Description copied from interface: ModuleListener
This is a call-back function. A signal module will call openPort to open the specific port of all the listener modules that are registered with this signal module

Specified by:
openPort in interface ModuleListener
